qas.question: What Catholic group was Father Erdland a part of?
In what year did Father Erdland leave the Marshall Islands?
In what year was Father Linckens' last visit to the Marshalls?
When was Father Linckens' book published?
In what year did Father Linckens first travel to the Marshalls?

context: Catholic missionary Father A. Erdland, from <a0_0>the Sacred Heart Jesu Society<a0_0/> based in Hiltrup, Germany, lived on Jaluit from around 1904 to <a1_0>1914<a1_0/>. He was very interested in the islands and conducted considerable research on the Marshallese culture and language. He published a 376-page monograph on the islands in 1914. Father H. Linckens, another missionary from the Sacred Heart of Jesu Society visited the Marshall Islands in <a4_0>1904<a4_0/> and <a2_0>1911<a2_0/> for several weeks. He published a small work in <a3_0>1912<a3_0/> about the Catholic mission activities and the people of the Marshall Islands.
